item.title: Real Full Browsing in Korea
item.description: <img src="http://www.lg.co.kr/common/inc/imageView.jsp?file_name=/upload/LA/LAA/20080325/viewsum_ms__id45_wiz20080325112410.JPG" alt=""> LG Telelcom, the smallest of three telecom operators in Korea launched mobile full browsing service with an attractive fixed-rate plan that allows unlimited data download within 6 month and 1G bytes after then for 6,000 won ($6) per month.
